titles.title: Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 4502) making appropriations for the Departments of Labor, Health and Human Services, and Education, and related agencies for the fiscal year ending September 30, 2022, and for other purposes; and for other purposes.

Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 4502) making appropriations for the Departments of Labor, Health and Human Services, and Education, and related agencies for the fiscal year ending September 30, 2022, and for other purposes; and for other purposes.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 117-109, by Mr. McGovern.

Rule provides for consideration of H.R. 4502 with 1 hour of general debate. Previous question shall be considered as ordered without intervening motions except motion to recommit. Measure will be considered read. Specified amendments are in order.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 28.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 555.
On ordering the previous question Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 217 - 201 (Roll no. 222).

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 218 - 207 (Roll no. 223).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: This resolution sets forth the rule for consideration of H.R. 4502 making appropriations for the Departments of Labor, Health and Human Services, and Education, and related agencies for the fiscal year ending September 30, 2022.
